Text:
Hello Funky Crystal! 
Thank you for this offering to the gods of karma.

A question: does this have English subtitles?

Thanking you in advance for your quick reply!
Simon in New Zealand

I'm glad you like this!

Unfortunately i could't find any subs.
If you find them please send them to me, so 
i can add them here!
nice.. I would be glad to see this movie!
